Configuration / Release Engineer in Retail Web Technologies/Web Solutions

As a member of the DCM team I coordinate resources for application deployments, develop release process improvements, and lead change ticket deployment teams and ensure 100% uptime of our client platforms.• Worked with WSO and Architecture teams to improve deployment process in CXP• Administrator of iKnow, Jira, and Confluence sites• Collaborated with colleagues on Standardization of Release Management process• Created a playbook for RWT development teams to following when deploying to Test Drive• Created and modified Jira stories for CXP/RWT releases• Collaborated with RWT teams to shorten the deployment timelines saving 2 hours of time

•	Oversaw the successful rollout of software and related hardware for a specific release.•	The impact of planned releases to systems owners and program managers was communicated in a timely manner. •	Created Application Profile for Chapter 33 with easily accessible information at hand.•	Updated New Team Member checklist with information and links to requirements for Build and Application Manager access

•	Implemented Change Management policies and procedures at three Texas state agencies, across various levels of stakeholders, and provide ongoing management of process in steady state •	Coordinate weekly Change Management activities and meetings for customer agencies and internal technical support groups•	Review infrastructure changes for audit compliance•	Communicate and provide ongoing training, as needed, to technical team members on the Change Management Process for audit compliance and the BMC Remedy Change Management application, a comprehensive policy and process management tool•	Uploaded Xerox Partner’s contact information to On-Call phones; Provided contact for FAQ page on DCS Portal Requested creation of Collaboration site for Xerox and Capgemini Change Managers to work together effectively; Created Distribution List for Agencies and Coordinators for DCS Shared Change Advisory Board.ITIL training

Develop System Operating ProceduresImplement System Management / MonitorManage Performance and CapacityManage System ChangePerform Availability ManagementPerform Systems Performance TuningUse System Monitor ToolsAttend Daily Status meetingAttend Team for Texas Change MeetingsManaged project of migrating THECB and TDI OperatorsCoordinated multi-agency PDU projectESP Batch Processing for TDIOrdering Supplies for Operations Department via BOND

Deploy, move, and collect technology equipment.Image laptops and desktops using Symantec Ghost.Maintenance of hardware and software inventories.Diagnose hardware and software issues on computers and laptops. Push software using System Management Server. Add and modify user’s profile as well as Create Distribution List in Active Directory.

Tim Wood
Snr. Asset Management and Change Management Specialist at LCRA (The Lower Colorado River Authority)
December 3, 2014, Tim was senior to Estella but didn’t manage directly

It is my great pleasure to recommend Stella Guerrero for any role related to Change Management, Operations, or Deskside Support. I hired Stella into the Capgemini Change Management team in July 2012 where she worked for eighteen months successfully building great relationships with her colleagues and with Customers who provided multiple instances of positive feedback related to her customer focus and service-oriented nature. Stella was always willing to go the extra mile to meet and exceed Customer expectations. A popular and enthusiastic member of the Change Management team, Stella was a primary contributor to maintaining the high levels of morale in the team and making the team’s working environment as positive as possible. Stella consistently demonstrated a high degree of technical acumen and an understanding of and adoption of Change Management best practices ensuring at all times that the work of the Agencies she supported was enabled while ensuring minimal risks to the IT Operational environment. It was a great pleasure to know and work with Stella for that period of time and I have no hesitation in providing this testimonial. Good luck with all your future endeavors Stella.
